#### pip-install-bitches was made by
Love ❌ code ✅

---
### 🎈・Code example
Example of how you can use [bitches](https://pypi.org/project/bitches/)
```py
import bitches #valid

bitches.get()

or

bitches.get("yes") #yes is the name of the directory
```
